Player History
Earned first career win on 4/7/1985...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,042,857 through salary arbitration...
9/11/1986: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $5,540,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 5/13/1987 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 3/24/1988 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Texas to San Diego on 2/17/1989 (Going to SD: P Greg A. Harris, LF Randy Ready. Going to TEX: 1B Kevin Maas)...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/8/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by New York (M) on 2/3/1991 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 8/24/1991, off Jeff Tabaka (PIT)...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/4/1993 to a 1-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
